properties.entry: SELECT correlation_id, process_id, state, created, modified FROM mu_process WHERE state >= 5 ORDER BY modified DESC
SELECT correlation_id, process_id, state, created, modified, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS now FROM mu_process WHERE state < 5 ORDER BY modified DESC

SELECT p.correlation_id, p.process_id, p.state, p.created, p.modified, s.step_id, s.retries, s.previous_state FROM mu_process p LEFT OUTER JOIN mu_process_step s ON (p.process_id = s.process_id) WHERE p.state = 5
SELECT p.correlation_id, p.process_id, p.state, p.created, p.modified, s.step_id, s.retries, s.previous_state FROM mu_process p LEFT OUTER JOIN mu_process_step s ON (p.process_id = s.process_id)

SELECT p.correlation_id, p.process_id, p.state, p.created, p.modified, s.step_id, s.retries, s.previous_state FROM mu_process p LEFT OUTER JOIN mu_process_step s ON (p.process_id = s.process_id) WHERE p.correlation_id = ?
SELECT state, result FROM mu_process WHERE correlation_id = ?
SELECT state FROM mu_process WHERE correlation_id = ?
SELECT process_id, state FROM mu_process WHERE correlation_id = ?
SELECT COUNT(*), state FROM mu_process GROUP BY state
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mu_process_step WHERE process_id = ?
UPDATE mu_process SET state = ?, result = ?, modified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE process_id = ?
INSERT INTO mu_process_step (process_id, step_id, class_name, method_name, activity_params, orchestr_params, previous_state) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
DELETE FROM mu_process_step WHERE process_id = ? AND step_id = ?

SELECT proc.correlation_id, step.step_id, step.class_name, step.method_name, step.activity_params, step.orchestr_params, step.retries, step.previous_state FROM mu_process_step step INNER JOIN mu_process proc ON proc.process_id = step.process_id WHERE proc.process_id = ? ORDER BY step_id DESC
SELECT step.process_id, step.step_id, step.retries FROM mu_process_step step WHERE step.process_id = ?
UPDATE mu_process_step SET retries = retries + 1, modified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE process_id = ? AND step_id = ?
